import React from 'react'; export const CardFullDisplay=(props) =>{ if(props == undefined){ return (<>); } return (
{props.hp}
{props.family}
{props.energy}
Add Friend
{props.name}
HP {props.hp}
Energy {props.energy}
Attack {props.attack} Defense {props.defense}
Actual Value {props.money}$
); }
